title: About Me
description: Hello! I'm Ege Ã–zler, a Software Engineer passionate about crafting exceptional user experiences with modern web technologies. Currently, I'm building innovative solutions as a Software Engineer while pursuing a Master's in Computer Science at Georgia Institute of Technology, with a specialization in Interactive Intelligence. My expertise spans JavaScript/TypeScript and cutting-edge frameworks, where I excel at developing responsive, high-performance web applications with clean, maintainable code. I'm always at the forefront of web trends and AI advancements, including designing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) agents to enhance intelligent systems. This blend of academic insight in Interactive Intelligence and hands-on development allows me to solve complex problems with technical precision, creativity, and a user-centric approach.
